mapper.insert: insert into NEWSENSORDATA (RECORDDATE, MPSNO, PROCESSNO, TASKNO, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, INTEGRITY, STATUS) values (#{recorddate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mpsno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{processno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{taskno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{starttime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{endtime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{integrity,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select: select RECORDDATE, MPSNO, PROCESSNO, TASKNO, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, INTEGRITY, STATUS from NEWSENSORDATA
